title: Python Influenced JavaScript Design
shortDescription: Python is one of 9 languages that influenced JavaScript's design!
detailedDescription: JavaScript's creator, Brendan Eich, drew inspiration from multiple programming languages when designing JavaScript. Python was one of the 9 languages that influenced JavaScript's design, along with AWK, C, HyperTalk, Java, Lua, Perl, Scheme, and Self. This shows Python's impact on the broader programming language ecosystem.
